mapper.select: select * from chattingroom_tb where g_seq = #{g_seq} and user_id = #{user_id}

select c.cr_seq, u.user_nick as cr_title, c.g_seq, c.user_id,(TIMESTAMPDIFF (minute,c.cr_opendate,now())) as cr_opendate from chattingroom_tb c, user_tb u where c.user_id = #{user_id} and c.cr_title = u.user_id union select c.cr_seq, c.cr_title, c.g_seq, u.user_nick as user_id ,(TIMESTAMPDIFF (minute,c.cr_opendate,now())) as cr_opendate from chattingroom_tb c, user_tb u where c.cr_title = #{user_id} and c.user_id = u.user_id order by cr_opendate
